Instruction: Scrub the beets and trim off the tops and roots. Peel if desired.
Cut the beets into wedges or cubes and place them on a baking sheet.
Drizzle olive oil over the beets and toss to coat evenly.
Roast in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the beets are tender, stirring halfway through cooking.
In a small bowl, whisk together red wine vinegar, Dijon mustard, and honey to make the dressing.
Drizzle the dressing over the roasted beets and toss to coat.
Season with salt and black pepper to taste.
Sprinkle crumbled feta cheese and toasted pine nuts over the beets.
Garnish with chopped fresh basil before serving.
Enjoy warm or at room temperature as a flavorful side dish.
